# HW2

Compile Hadley’s Advanced R to a PDF according to 
https://brettklamer.com/diversions/statistical/compile-hadleys-advanced-r-programming-to-a-pdf/.

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
# Install R Package Dependencies
devtools::install_github("hadley/sloop")
devtools::install_github("hadley/emo")

# Compile the book
bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", output_format = "bookdown::pdf_book")
```


### Quitting from lines 4-5 (Introduction.Rmd) 
Error in dev.control(displaylist = if (record) "enable" else "inhibit") : 
  dev.control() called without an open graphics device

Solution For Mac setup:
Download Quartz X11 at https://www.xquartz.org , install, restart your Mac
install.packages("Cairo")
Test library(Cairo) - if this fails, start over (the rest is the same)
install or update devtools
install posterdown from GitHub
install tinytex

From:https://github.com/brentthorne/posterdown/issues/42
